formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Eigenvectors and Eigenvalues calculation: \( A \cdot v = \lambda \cdot v \), where \( A \) is the covariance matrix, \( v \) is the eigenvector, and \( \lambda \) is the eigenvalue.
